description: Studyplus App for Android v6.3.7 and earlier and Studyplus App for iOS v8.29.0 and earlier use a hard-coded API key for an external service. By exploiting this vulnerability, API key for an external service may be obtained by analyzing data in the app.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: for Android v6.3.7 and earlier, and for iOS v8.29.0 and earlier
